title: 5 Podcasts and Indie Print Magazines That Offer Mind-Altering Takes on the World of Food and Drink
text:
If You Like This Podcast…

Ox Tales: Each year, chefs, scholars, scientists and other musers on matters culinary assemble in England for the Oxford Symposium on Food & Cookery. This podcast makes the most interesting research presented there accessible in the form of engaging audio stories. In one episode, a Japanese food historian unpacks the cultural significance of slurping. In another, a third-generation foie gras producer grapples with the passion and opprobrium inspired by her livelihood. oxfordsymposium.org.uk/podcasts

…You’ll Love This Journal

...
description: We’ve paired them for your listening and perusing pleasure. Turn on, tune in, eat up.
